volumes2image.c File Reference

volumes2image - vconvert a volume set into a raster image. More...

Detailed Description

volumes2image - vconvert a volume set into a raster image.

Description
vconvert a volume set into a raster image
Reference
The volume respresentation is described in:
G. Lohmann (1998). "Volumetric Image Analysis", John Wiley & Sons, Chichester, England.
Usage
volumes2image
Parameters:
-in  input volume set
-out  output raster image
Examples

Known bugs
none.

G.Lohmann, MPI-CBS, 2004
